key_risks: Economic Sensitivity: Dependent on small business sector health and interest rate fluctuations
Regulatory Risks: Subject to stringent federal and state banking regulations
Concentration Risk: Focus on niche industries exposes to sector-specific downturns
Competition: Intense competition from traditional banks and fintech lenders
Credit Risk Concerns: Investor concerns over credit risk and profitability
controversies: Recent stock price declines post-Q3 2024 results
social_issues: Commitment to ESG principles, including supporting underserved communities
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance under Dodd-Frank Act and Basel III
